statements: SELECT * FROM attendance_data
SELECT student_id, attendance_status, lecture_date FROM attendance_data
SELECT student_id, lecture_date, attendance_status FROM attendance_data WHERE attendance_status='Present'
SELECT lecture_date, COUNT(*) as total_attendance FROM attendance_data GROUP BY lecture_date
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM attendance_data
SELECT * FROM attendance_data WHERE student_id = 123 AND lecture_date = '2022-10-10';
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM attendance_data ORDER BY lecture_date DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_data WHERE lecture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM attendance_data WHERE attendance_status IN ('Present', 'Late') ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(attendance_status) AS total_attendance FROM attendance_data GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(attendance_status) > 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_id, attendance_status FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_id, workshop_id, workshop_date FROM workshop_attendance WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE lecture_id = 3 ORDER BY attendance_time DESC;
SELECT student_id, workshop_id FROM workshop_attendance WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, lecture_id, attendance_status, attendance_time FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY attendance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM workshop_attendance WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01' AND workshop_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY workshop_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, lecture_id, attendance_status FROM virtual_lecture_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' ORDER BY lecture_id, student_id;
SELECT student_id, workshop_id, attendance_status FROM workshop_attendance WHERE workshop_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY workshop_id, student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, workshop_id, attendance_status FROM workshop_attendance WHERE workshop_date = CURDATE() ORDER BY workshop_id DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lecture_attendance ORDER BY lecture_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_info WHERE enrollment_status='Active';
SELECT workshop_date, attendance_status FROM workshop_attendance WHERE workshop_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, lecture_date, attendance_status FROM lecture_attendance WHERE attendance_status='Present' ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_status FROM student_info ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM student_info WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT lecture_date, attendance_status FROM lecture_attendance WHERE student_id = 123 ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM student_info WHERE student_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM workshop_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Late' AND workshop_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM lecture_attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_attendance > 5 ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, lecture_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date, lecture_time FROM lecture ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_time FROM workshop WHERE workshop_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT student_id, event_type, event_date FROM engagement_monitoring WHERE event_type = 'exam';
SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = true;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_name FROM lecture ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(event_id) AS num_events FROM engagement_monitoring GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_events > 2;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_time FROM workshop WHERE workshop_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT student_id, lecture_attendance FROM student_attendance;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_topic, lecture_date FROM lecture_schedule WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_id, workshop_topic FROM workshop_schedule ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, student_id, event_type, event_date FROM attendance_log WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT engagement_id, student_id, lecture_engagement_score, workshop_engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT student_id, lecture_attendance, workshop_attendance FROM student_attendance;
SELECT * FROM lecture_schedule ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_topic, workshop_date FROM workshop_schedule WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, event_type, event_date FROM attendance_log WHERE event_type = 'lecture' OR event_type = 'workshop';
SELECT student_id, lecture_engagement_score, workshop_engagement_score FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY workshop_engagement_score DESC, student_id ASC;
